introduction.description: Always wanted to be a consultant but my path changed when I saw the possibility and capacity for bigger things through technology development.
Love to ideate and explore new possibilities. Love to surround myself with like-minded people that wishes to make the world a better place.
Focuses on full stack web development in JavaScript. Love spending my free time creating new code projects serving both as a learning platform and service.

projects.title: MaiMai (Final Year Project)
descriptions: MaiMai is a C2C marketplace platform for people to buy and sell products as well as services.
The key feature that enables MaiMai to become safer is the ability to create smart contracts between buyers and sellers.
screenshots: tn_MaiMai Real Time Chat and Smart Contract.png

projects.title: PHDIS web Application
descriptions: Leave Management System for PHD Students in SMU.
Engaged in numerous open source Javascript APIs to implement more user-friendly functions.

projects.title: Telegram Bot - @bible_butler_bot
descriptions: Implemented up to 10 different APIs across different platforms, such as telegram, yelp and google, to acquire data for different functions.
Utilized Webpack.js to bundle and reduced response time by up to ~1000ms per reply.

description: Love Basketball. I'm a fan of the 2015-2016 NBA Champions, Golden State Warriors. I love them hugely for unselfish plays and amazing ball movement.
Love reading non-fictional self-help books and Medium. Do you know they have tons of interesting articles?
Love Canada and its national parks. So in an attempt to capture some of these natural wonder, I decided to share them with you below!
Love coding on a regular basis. That's pretty weird isn't it? Do check them out in my portfolio.

understand.header: Understand who I am as a person
description: Started my journey as a developer in University. It all began with Java / JSP. All that changed during my Final Year Project in Junior year. We decided on Metoer, React.js, MongoDB and Node.js. I found my passion for JavaScript since then and it was just tons of self driving from then on.

I've never coin myself as a genius coder but rather, an individual determined to raise above challenges and prioritises on the learning process. I would like to leave you with this quote: “Mere change is not growth. Growth is the synthesis of change and continuity, and where there is no continuity there is no growth.” - C.S. Lewis
Always be faithful with the opportunities and talents given to you. No matter how small or insignificant these talents may seem today, who knows what you may find yourself in tomorrow.
Independently dealt with clients from gathering requirements to technical implementation with 0 complaints
Implemented users’ requirements based on Javascript Node.JS Vue.js
Debugged up to 100 bugs over 3 months helping to speed up the operations of KeyReply and meet deadlines promptly
Anchored the VBA scripts used for internal reporting and external communications in raising service request, which helped to streamline the business service request process by at least 50%

Independently created a SAP Financial Data Migration and Data Reconciliation Manual for the internal project team’s usage, which helped to reduce more than 50% of required operational effort through the consolidated instructions and knowledge transfer from the overseas team
Actively involved in the data reconciliation and financial disprepancy investigation for a client’s 90 company codes
Assisted the Data Migration Team Lead with Full Dream Rehearsal Planning and execution processes prior to Actual Cut Over (ACO)

experiences.company: UOB-SMU Asian Enterprise Institute | Aesthetic Clinic Industry & Oral Care Industry
description: Laid out multiple marketing strategies, which helped the company effectively reach out to youths via school platforms
Applied analytics on data collected via market research (surveys and focus groups), which helped the company identify timely trends in the marketing industry

description.academicFocus: Bachelor of Science in Information Systems, BSc (ISM), 2nd Major in Finance - Magna Cum Laude
description: Placed on School of Information’s Systems Dean’s list for AY2015-2016 & AY2016-2017

bottom_menu.footer_header: Get a website that actually looks amazing and within a week
footer: This website is proudly made in Node.js, Next.js (React.js framework) over the course of a few days.
bottom_menu.verse: I can do all this through him who gives me strength - Philippians 4:13
